author: Adam Kramer
title: Is Lynn Bowden Jr. the NFL's Next Unicorn?
description: Fearing he might lose access or lose someone their job,  Lynn Bowden Jr.  stops short of naming the gym he is using to stay in shape during the most important offseason of his life...
content: Fearing he might lose access or lose someone their job, Lynn Bowden Jr. stops short of naming the gym he is using to stay in shape during the most important offseason of his life. Preparing for the NFL draft is hard enough. Doing so during a pandemic is enoug… [+13421 chars]
